content.detailedDescription:
On the night of friday, april 17th, my wife felt compelled to look out our back window, which she typically does not do at night.  she called to me in a panicked voice, then pointed out an object hovering ~30 degrees above the horizon, due west, which is the direction our back window faces. it was brighter than any star to my knowledge. i am an avid stargazer.

we spent the next twenty minutes going over possible explanations.  i 
kept it oriented with stationary objects, and as far as i could tell it did not move.  it also seemed to maintain a constant distance.

we avoided drawing conclusions and continued to observe, noting that the object pulsed softly, and that the color of the object changed from white to orange-red.

while discussing the details, having temporarily averted our eyes, we were surprised to discover that the object had disappeared. i immediately checked north and south, also checking to see if the object had gained altitude.  there was no sign of it.  the time between last sighting and disappearance was about 1 minute.

this topic has gained significance in our lives of late due to my wife's experiences. after the sighting, after retiring on friday night, my wife was awakened (she did not check the time on this occasion) by the rattle of a hanger she had left on our cocker spaniel's (kinzie) pen, which sits under the bedroom window. she noted kinzie sitting in the middle of the pen, not near the sides, looking at my wife. my wife then panned her view across the room and noticed something move past the dim light coming from the cable box, which we cover at night. thus, the light was dim, but enough for her to tell it was blocked as if someone had walked by. she did not discern a shape.

my wife has had increasingly strong feelings of presences in our room at night, sleep disturbances about the same time at night (just after 1am and 3:30am), and unexplained marks on her body. the latest of these is a circular pattern of marks on her left buttock having no explanation.  this pattern was noticed just this morning, april 19th.

if there is any follow up by a mufon researcher, we ask that the greatest care be taken to protect our anonymity. we are both degreed professionals, trained in objective documentation of evidence, though for the same reason have sensitive careers to consider.
content.summary: Stationary starlike object hovered for approx. 20 minutes, then disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Saw an orange ball of light heading towards me, clearly not a  plane, made no sound and had a circle underneath it that i noticed when it was directly overhead, plasma-type light, and the circle underneath it was like a life saver candy. it was moving at a steady speed and when it was about to be overhead, it looked like it was distorting and then it changed from being just an orange ball to an orange ball with an o in the center like a life saver candy, when i saw this change i knew it was a ufo so i took the phone and was looking for the icon on the screen to activate the video camera (which took about 7 seconds) i looked back at the sky and it was gone, and there was plenty of clear sky with no trees in the way so it either disappeared or sped off quickly, i shouldnt have taken my eyes off it but i wanted to record it
content.summary: Saw an orange ball of light heading towards me, clearly not a  plane, made no sound and had a circle underneath it that i noticed when it was directly overhead, plasma type light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on 1st ave south in st pete fl and i noticed an odd shaped object flying with 4-6 lights on it. looked light a wide triangle shape. dark color surface object.Could barely see the object itself. my cell phone wouldn't turn on when i tried to take a picture of it when i slowed down. further down 1st ave it flew up and then i never saw it or anything else in the sky. no other objects flying around. it looked like something i havent seen before thats how i was observing because i was like " wow whats that "
i live in a high rise building downtown and went on my balcony  and didnt see anything flying around shortly after either.4-19-15 9;59pm exactly?? is when i noticed it for  less than 2 mins
any info or other sightings about this particular object. please let me know thanks. 


___________________________________________________________


i also saw something a few years that i would like to report as well and have more details about it also!!!! would like someone to talk to about that one... this incident involbed three triangle shaped objects at once in a l shape form floating then dissapered all had three lights in each corner they floated to the left and disappeared from sight. clear sky night nothing else in the sky  would like to talk to someone and report these sightings. thank you i have an exact location and a witness that was with me and saw info you can retrieve as well
content.summary: Weird looking triangle objects 4-6 lights floated up and over and then flew up and dissapeard from sight in the middle of city nothing else in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to cover the grill.It was a clear night. i always look to the sky to observe the stars. one star seemed bigger and brighter than the rest. i then realized this was not a star! it moved in a strange way. at first i thought it was a helicopter but it had no motor noise.
it would get very bright and then dim in irregular pattern. it would suddenly disappear and then reappear in the same position it was in before.
i got my binoculars to get a better look, i noticed that it had red and green lights but i could make out where they would have been located on the craft (and no it was not the port and starboard lights on a plain or other aircraft that i have seen). this was something i have never seen before. it stayed in the same area but moved in short radical movements.
i don't know what it was!
content.summary: Hovering over oneida lake for a long period of time.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving me to work. we were going southbound on sunrise avenue toward rancho cordova from carmichael california. i kept looking out my window (toward the west). the sky was pretty and you could see several stars despite the city lights. we crossed the bridge over the american river (this part of the road is the darkest). i saw a star that seemed to really be blinking all kinds of colors. when we were over the bridge, i looked away for a moment. i looked back and the "star" that i had been looking at was gone. i looked at my husband and was telling him what i was seeing. i looked at the sky again and there was another "star" that looked like the size of a pin dot. it suddenly became illuminated, the light was so big and bright that it looked as big as a basketball. it then looked like someone turned a dimmer switch, because the objects light slowly faded until nothing was visible. it looked like it was very high up in the sky. the whole event (with the light going from tiny, to large, to disappearing) lasted only for seconds.
content.summary: I saw a light that looked like a star completely illuminate to the size of a basketball and then dim out and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: this is not about a ufo sighting  this is about the aliens that are already living on this earth.  i'm a registered surgical nurse that has been secluded all my life waiting to deal with what i have told you  i met a psychic/channel in 1974 who came to me and drew me some symbols on a piece of paper and told me they are the intergalactic alphabet  i was in nursing school at that time she made reference to the fact that i would be in orthopedics  and she kept talking about the intergalactic ships i thought she was a "little off"  as time went on i realized that what she said has to b true  i know there are many races of beings  here and being funded by our government  they are getting more difficult to manage and in 3 years they will b coming "out of the closet"  i have not had time to to investigate what i have just told you  but i also am a psychic and i want to know what i am supposed to do  this is going to happen i do hope you find a way to get in touch with me   . [name & address removed/cms/rjl] there is so much more to tell you
content.summary: Read message below

content.detailedDescription: I do not know if this in anything worthwhile but i was testing out my new camera on a hill doing a panorama and i noticed an object in one of the pictures afterwards. this object does not appear in the photo that was taken 1 sec earlier. according to my canon software the first photo titled b4 was taken at 2:02:56 and the photo titled wtf (lol) was taken at 2:02:57. if you look at the second photo (wtf) all the way in the lower right hand corner just above the houses there is an object it looks fast but i do not know what it is. i watermarked the photos because i did put them on twitter a while ago. i did keep the original on the sd card i took it on on and never altered it or anything. i have the sd card with all the photos from that day but nothing else strange appears. please let me know if you figure it out.
content.summary: Was testing my dslr doing a panorama from a hill and accidentally caught something in one of the shots.

content.detailedDescription: I've taken my binoculars to watch the stars. after multiple star sighting, i've decided to watch a second time the same spot in the sky and i saw a star-shaped object that traveled 4 times faster than a aircraft from north to south and i removed my binoculars to see if the sighting was possible with eyes but that object was invisible to the eye.
content.summary: Once again, i've taken my binoculars to watch the stars

content.detailedDescription: It was weird it was just hovering there like something was watching you.Then it just shot off but it had a huge beam of light almost blinding.
content.summary: It was spherical and no sound but it had  a huge beam of light  but it was so fast like lighting.

content.detailedDescription: I have written on several sights about my encounter over the years, but no one believes me.  i forget about it and then it resurfaces, but i will never waiver from what i saw.  mid '80's (either summer of 1984 or 1985) i attended my sister's friends' barbecue before they packed up to move to texas. they are born again christians and the husband is a minister, so there was no alcohol at this party.  the home was located in yonkers ny right by the hudson river in ny.  i recall leaving the party at the beginning of dusk (still light out) and i was driving my mother home.  my baby daughter was in the car seat in the front.  my mother and i were conversing and i glanced up and saw a round object moving in the distance, and thought i must have been seeing things.  my mother was in the back seat, so i didn't point it out.  i recall driving part of the way, but seemed to have lost a bit of time because by the time i got to my mom's home (only about 20 minutes away), it was pitch black outside.  i dropped my mother off (she lives on a one way street), and drove up and around the curve, to the top of the hill, and then made a right onto the road heading toward the adjacent town (a very upscale and prominent town).  as i turned, within a block, i hit a traffic light.  before i got to the light, i looked up and i saw the object again, only it was very low and appeared to be descending!  i felt like i was driving in low motion, all the while staring at this object.  it resembled the starship enterprise, only it was round/disc in shape with windows, and had no additional features like the enterprise.  the closer i got to the traffic light, the lower this object appeared.  at this point, i'm looking from far left of the windshield . . . to the far right of my ford ltd - 8 cylinder vehicle and could not see the entire craft!  i remember grabbing onto my daughter's hand, and totally started to panic!  in my head, i'm thinking "how huge is this thing, if their purpose is to try and land!"  "how come i am the only person who sees this thing?!"  i truly thought we were being invaded.  no one is on the road!  this is a highly populated area, 30 minutes from manhattan!!  i heard no noise.  i saw no other living sole.  i don't know how many times the light might have changed.  i kept staring at this object.  everyone is going to think i am crazy!  who is going to believe me!!  i don't recall how much time passed, but this object was hovering and very, very low, and did not make a sound.  i kept thinking if it ever landed, it could have taken out several towns!  i finally noticed the light change and i slowly proceeded (thinking "if they see my car moving, who knows what is going to happen."), as i headed toward the next town.  the object quickly (and silently) rose, and i continued to watch it while i drove toward the town.  by the time i got to the town near the train station, it disappeared into the darkness.  seeing an object off into the distance is one thing; however, this object was so huge, i was not able to see from one end of the object to the other through my car windshield!  that was 30 years ago and i can picture it in my head like it happened last night!  i know what i saw and i won't deviate from my story.  i don't know why no one else saw this object on a sunday evening in august of 1984-1985, but it happened.  yes, i can find out the exact year through my sister's friend.  living in an extremely populated area only makes the experience more puzzling.  yes, it happened.
content.summary: Observed from 1 town then noticed in another, then overhead - huge and directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: we were visiting relatives in foster ky along western hills road.  there was a variety of adults and children at a bonfire.  the kids and one adult went inside because we were sitting under a tree full of june bugs and they started dive bombing us. this left 5 adults sitting by the fire. we were looking around and up, because of the large numbers of flying insects. around 9 pm one of us spotted bright lights that came on and then off low above the horizon to the north east. it was a slow unpredictable process and at first we weren't sure what we were looking at. then the lights moved a little more to the north and were more active. the were not moving fast and appeared to hover.  during this time, there were many airplanes moving across the sky. the planes were much higher and smaller and less bright.  the strange lights were bright and bigger than any i have seen attached to aircraft. at first, the lights were coming on and off in patterns of three in a straight line. there were at least 3 object described by 3 lights each. they took awhile to go through the process, and we were never sure they would start again. after we figured there were about 3 objects in total, they went out for a long while (5 minutes). when the lights re-appeared there were a series of about 9 lights that described the right half of an arc to the right (east) of the original sighting. i was immediately reminded of the phoenix lights. we weren't scared, but we knew it was nothing ordinary or that we had seen before. then clouds began to cover the sky and we couldn't see the lights anymore. the sighting ended about 9:30 pm.
content.summary: Multiple lights appeared above horizon first in a straight line then describing an arc

content.detailedDescription: My daughter went to a conference in san antonio and took a picture of the towers of america one evening and later realized a ufo was in the picture located to the left of the towers. it appears to be too high to be a street light. comments please.
content.summary: Took picture of towers of america in san antonio and later saw ufo in picture

content.detailedDescription:
[addres removed/cms/rjl] i thought they were helicopters at first as they were incredibly bright.

i pulled over immediately and exited my car, and watched them for about two minutes. they were the shade of orange i can liken to the union 76 logo, and appeared to be connected at first almost like a barbell, one at each end.

that all changed.

suddenly the orb furthest to the se started pulsating brightly, and started shedding large "globs" of what looked like liquid metal. it then went slightly up in elevation and disappeared as i was watching.

the remaining orb started doing the same shedding of globs, pulsated brightly a few times, and then also disappeared.

it was incredible.
content.summary: Two orbs of pulsating orange hovering, melting, and disappearning

content.detailedDescription:
[coordinates removed/cms/rjl]

driving to a friends house in nashwauk mn on a sunday morning in 1998.  as i turned onto co highway 86 into nashwauk, i noticed a large silver orb, appox 15ft in diameter slowly floating from west to east appox 100ft above the ground.  i stopped my car in the middle of the road and watched for appox 1 minute when the orb slowed and stopped directly above the road appox 100ft in front of me and 100ft above the ground.  at this point i got out of my car and just watched it for appox 7-8 minutes.

it was completely spherical, silver with no seams.  completely smooth and reflective (but not quite mirror like, more like a chrome bumper that reflected some, but not perfectly).  made no noise.  i thought it might be a balloon but it was too close to the ground, a perfect sphere, solid like steel, and it stopped.  i also noted it was a north wind so it was not following the direction of the wind.  i just stared at it for what seemed like 7-8 minutes, but i'm not sure.  

also notable was i was stopped right in the middle of the road with my car door wide open.  no other cars came by during this time which was strange.  it was a sunday morning so traffic was slow but this was a main entrance into town.  there always was traffic in and out on this road.

after the 7-8 minutes passed it started moving again to the east, completely silent, slowly at first for a couple hundred feet, than accelerating quickly to well over 100mph, perhaps faster but not over the sound barrier. 

i just stood dumbfounded for a minute, got in my car and continued on to my friends house less than 1/2 mile away in town.  i still don't know exactly what i saw, but i'll consider it a ufo always.  no alien contact, no communication, just a sighting at an incredibly close distance.  i'm not aware of any loss of or acceleration of time but i'm still confused as to how transfixed i was by the object and that no other vehicles came by during that time.  still confused to this day as to what exactly i saw.
content.summary: Large silver orb 15ft across 100ft above ground floats than hovers, leaves at high speed

content.detailedDescription: My brother, cousin and a friend of mine where driving in a back woods road. we had stopped and parked for an unknown amount of time. suddenly i heard something moving outside of the car. where we parked the woods were dense. you could hear something crunching sticks and leaves. i told my cousin, who was driving to turn down the stereo because i heard something outside. my brother, being a joker, said that he seen a hand reaching thru the window. i freaked out and closed the window a fast as i could. i instisted that there was something out there, but they just laughed. afew minutes later we decided to leave and when we crested a hill in front of us, there in front of us was a creature approximately 10 feet tall. it's arms were at it's sides, could not see eyes, and it just stood there. it was about 50 feet in front of us. my cousin turned on his high beams, as we continued to watch it. we all got scared, and my cousin put the car in reverse and drove what seemed like 50 mph backwards, for about 1/4 of a mile. we got out there and went home. we dicussed what we had seen and agreed we seen the same thing. and yes, i said i told you so.
content.summary: 10 foot tall alien seen at night with headlights on it.

content.detailedDescription: Light was sighted in the w/nw sky with erratic path. there is the landing flight path for ft. lauderdale international airport that is in the area however the altitude of the aircraft is higher in this area.  light was sighted when out having a smoke.  watched object for many hours and have seen it on other night in the same location.
content.summary: Unknown light in w/nw sky, hovering and moving slowly the with various speeds

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 11:05pm, before 11:08pm, april 18, 2015-04-19
latitude:48.758574°
longitude:-80.689589°
clear night, no clouds, four square greyish lights shaped as a triangle, no sound whatsoever, moving very fast toward the north.
each square was approximately one inch square from my point of view, the big dipper was in the background when it was directly overhead.
lasted about 3 – 4 seconds…much faster than when iss passes or satellites.
content.summary: Clear night, no clouds, four square greyish lights shaped as a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Observed star like object from backyard of my house in west phoenix star was s/w of my house for three hrs and slowly moved to n/w and below horizon
content.summary: Star was flashing red white blue green colors

content.detailedDescription: At a couple of minutes past 11pm on 4-18. i went to open my window. the church roof is gutter even with my window on the 2nd floor of my unit.My only window is facing west.Has i opened the window a large shadow going from my right to my left which is going to my south, i live two blocks from the beach. i have seen a lot of air traffic and air traffic is not allowed to fly that low.Has to my left at my 10 a clock position. it slowed to stop for a couple of seconds. looking at it i was highly curious.I was also a commercial photographer at one time and i have very good eye for detail.Has i noticed when it stopped the light came from the inside of the craft not the exterior of the craft. has it moved it seemed to be floating rather effortlessly.No sound at all.The light was a medium illumination. i remember a structure of the light in a circular and tall going around the craft. there was smaller shadows in the light has it stood for that moment.Has it started to move west it was about 3 blocks away at about 250 ft. high.It was clear evening. stars were clear.Has it went, in a floating manner ascended,a couple of seconds more it shimmied left to right  abruptly and it picked up speed and in a curve it went from a west path to a south west path. within a few more seconds moving,still in view, in an attitude of the adjusting in the bend of flight it just vanished, that was it.There is nothing in the sky that moves in this manner, and at the height has low.I have seen helicopters operate within these altitudes, but the sound of a chopper is very distinct,and loud at the height and distance from my position,also the way the object moved makes a chopper look clumsy.The object moved in a very different,smooth way, and at the end of the sighting it covered a huge distance in a couple of seconds and was gone altogether.                                         the truth is out there!
content.summary: Passed very low over my 4 story house.Large shadow caught my attention at 11 pm ! looked out my window saw a lit  object obove at a 10 aclock position 250 ft to my left stop then floated away ,shimmy left and right  and bend on acurve west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was not a witness to this event but am witness to another. at this time i was at college. my mother((49yr old) older brother (23)sister(12) brother (6)
were sitting at the kitchen table. our house was on top of a hill with woods and rolling fields. it was surrounded by about 121 acres. it was dark. my mom saw what she thought was a small plane heading for the windows. she told the little kids to hit the floor. she and my older brother watched it. there was no sound. she saw windows and beings in side-she said she made eye contact. it hovered and then disappeared.My mom called a pilot friend. he made some calls and told her that nothing was reported in the area.As far as i know they never saw anything again.
   about the same time about 5 miles away a neighbor saw a landed disk with beings collecting samples from the ground. [(a) city removed/cms/rjl]. she is now in her 70's.
   [(b) address removed/cms/rjl]. it is at the base of the "gunks" whitley strieber's house where he claims he was abducted is about 1/8mile away.I met him in the 90's before he left the area and he told me his story.
   my neighbors claim that they woke up and there were people over them and they had the same dream. it seemed to me like a psychic abduction. the woman refuses to speak of it and i have not be able to get her husband alone. he will speak of it.
  in around 1995. at that time my daughter and i lived on my parents property in krumville. krumville is about 7 miles from the ashokan reservoire. it was 11 o'clock at night around june 9th. i was driving home (c_ from an off premise catering job. [{address removed/cms/rjl]. my first thought was that they were having a party. my second thought was the lights must be the huge old fashioned kind and how and when did they put them so high in the tree. the entire tree was lit up. as i drove closer to it. the lights left it in a swarm. the balls of red light-maybe 100 crossed the road and flew into the field and disappeared. the lights did not pulsate and all went off at the same time. at first i thought about following. i had to stop myself. and then i became afraid...Because of the unknown. i spoke w/ a biology teacher and was poo pooed that it was just a phosphorescent swarm of insects. i asked him grapefruit size. he shrugged.There are many sightings in this area and have been as far back as can be accounted by witness.
content.summary: Disk, orbs and psychic abduction

content.detailedDescription: I have already talk to lady from mufon  and was going to give her the rest of my photos. i must have wrote down her email address wrong or something. so this is several pictures that the family took of superstition mountains. my boy brady was the one who took the picture that caught out attention.
content.summary: Green cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back the the u.S. had just got out of the navy and was with 2 friends walking and though its a perfect time to take a picture of mount etna i believe; i did not observe this with the naked eye only after i took and looked at the picture some weeks later i cannot make out with this is doesnt look like any plane i ever seen in my life
content.summary: I just took a picture and when i looked it was there

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my bike run on the street that i usually take for excersise and i was walking up a hill on the road with my bike because it was to steep to bike up. i got to the top as usual and i was trying to catch my breath from trying to pedal up the hill. i finnaly caught it. i got on my bike to keep going but i saw a shadow on the ground. i looked up to see what had caused it but there was nothing there. i let it go and continued to pedal. as i moved it seemed as if the shadow got widder and was following me. i stopped because i had noticed it was now as big as a hot air ballon. and before it had only been the size of a basketball i looked up again but this time there was a silver sphere it looked really small but as it got closer the shadow went away from me and towards the sphere. the supers touched the ground and shot back up. later i went to tell my parents and being only 13 they wouldn't beleive me. the incessant also happened to occur near a park i sometimes bike to where my dad and i saw lights flying in the sky before when i was 6. this only happened yesterday.
content.summary: There where no lights in the sky but a shadow formed on ground then silver object appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed at around 10:30 pm. i have a large skylight right above my head and i can see a small patch of sky while in bed. at 10:30 pm i saw a glowing white orb through the skylight streak by at tremendous speed travelling north.  it was apparently golf ball sized, but was probably a lot bigger because of it's altitude. i dismissed it thinking it was some sort of meteor or satellite entering the atmosphere.  a few minutes later i saw another orb streak by the skylight in the same direction and same speed. i thought, what are the chances of 2 meteors streaking by the exact same patch of sky so that they are seen through my skylight? i then felt compelled to get dressed and go out into the back yard, which i did. after waiting about 5 minutes, another object came in from the north travelling south at many thousands of mph.  this time it was at a much higher altitude because it was much smaller (almost star like).  it zig zagged a few times but generally kept on a southerly course.  it stopped above the southern horizon and descended until it was apparently basketball sized, then streaked by going north.  over the next half hour i observed 3 more orbs travelling north and south.  the last orb was the only one to suddenly stop, then head slightly west, then perform a 90 degree turn on a dime and head north out of sight.  that was the end of my experience.  there was nothing the rest of the night.
content.summary: Saw glowing golf ball sized changing alt. and dir.

content.detailedDescription: Daughter and i were out watching the stars when she noticed a very bright object moving slowly over house we watched it for about 45 seconds there were no flashing lights and no sound and then it just vanished
content.summary: Daughter and i were watching the stars she noticed a very bright object moving slow over our house no blinking lights no sound traveled south east for about 45 seconds and just vanished

content.detailedDescription: On this relatively clear evening i was standing on the back deck of my home in talent, or at 9:30 pm (pdt) looking up at the evening sky, looking to the east, when i viewed a steady bright light, like the evening 'star' venus, about the size of venus, white in color, in the eastern sky to the right and below the star arcturus, it was noticibly brighter than any other stars in the sky, and appeared to be at a great distance from me. it was moving rapidly to the east and south. i used the star arcturs to judge the object's movement 'up and away' from me. as it moved the light grew smaller and smaller and just before disappearing appeared to change to a red color. there was no sound associated with it. i felt no fear or emotions, before, during, after this experiene, only excitement when i realized that the bright object was moving and becoming smaller at the same time. it turned into a small red speck for a split second before disappearing.
content.summary: Bright white light in the eastern sky to ther south/below the star arcturus, moved rapidly to the se about 15 degrees, becoming smaller as it moved, and turned to a small red speck before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I was out picking wedgies in the field when my cows becames very agitated. all of de sudden a bright light appeared above. i felt scared. my cow mooed reassuredly, i placed my hand onto [name removed/cms/rjl]tender neck. she mooed slowly. the light came closer and i felt myself go. i hads wet my pants. the light descended onto my corn field and took away a good harvest. my brother [name removed/cms/rjl] ran out the house screamin bout the corn. it had taken all year to muture and now we'd have no money for fresh food or clothes. the winter came and went and by golly it was a harsh time for us. my cows were very upset. anyway the light descended and came towards my cows. edwardo, the biggest one of the bunch mooed slowly. the light finally touched down and burnt away the grass surrounding the area. out of the light emerged a slug. a robotic slug. it spewed lots of slime and let out a slug like noise. "ugh" it shouted. very slug like. the slug then burned my cows, mutilated my cows, and depressed my cows. depressed as in needs help. after burning, mutilating, and depressed my cows the slug took little  and got into back the orb. the orb took off and hovered over my bald head. it tried to speak again. the only words i could make out were "gotta...H..Ave...Me...A...Good...La--asaaagaaaaa." the orb then vibrated very intensly. like one of them tiny bullet vibrators. then it shot up into the sky and disappeared forever. i had a hard night explaining things to momma. she wasn't too happy but understood. then i took a bath in the well outside and went to bed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Robotic slug descended and mutilated, burned, and depressed my cows.

content.detailedDescription: Beautiful evening, on a rural  lake, approximately 40 miles from lake superior.  i was (about age 30) enjoying the magnificent milky way, looking n.E. saw bright red light, miles up/away.  staring, i realized there were 10 or 12 smaller ones, circling the largest light. every 5 minutes  or so, one of the smaller ones would suddenly take off like a shot, disappearing over the horizon in seconds.  my father,  a navy bomber photograper, lived next door, i ran to get him, he was sort of drunk, but came out, watched a couple of the smaller  units blast away from the main one, his comment  was. holy cow! " i've been in  a hundred military  flights,  and nothing from earth can move like that", his opinion mirrored mine, as to location, saying they "looks like they're  out over lake superior." then he walked away saying "don't let them take you away" . i watched the last of the small units fly away , then the large one made several  circles its self before dissapearing  at a speed so fast it was hard to track visually.   the entire  spectacle  lasted almost an hour. i grew up in a time, 50's and 60's,  when most adults  just took it as fact that ufo's were real. i can remember my parents  talking with their  friends, hearing commits like, well, they allready have dead ones from crashes,  pieces of spaceships , erc., it's only a matter of time before they catch a survivor, then we'll  really know what's going on, some people  were excited,  anticipated meeting our neighbors  from space!. then something  changed, early 60's , no more new articles about  ufo's,  the government started denying their  existence, etc.  literally like a huge ufo cover-up became national policy of our government.       during that same time frame, a friend of mine driving her car, said one hovered over her car, about 5 or 6 miles  from where i lived. her car died, no power.No lights, nothing, she was terrified,  then it flew away, her car started and she kept  driving, fast.  the next day, there were  only 4 or 5 houses in this desolate little  neighborhood,  but  all reported power failures,  lights, tv's and  radio outages,  etc, 2 more  claimed  they saw a huge bright light hovering overhead maybe a 100 feet over the trees, then flying away.
content.summary: Multi  units circling central unit, each departing central unit approx 5 minutes  apart  in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: My family and my friends family were sitting on the beach watching the sunset. his said look and pointed to the sky. we looked and saw an object that had four lights two at the top about 150' apart and two at the bottom about 300' apart. it slowly moved down towards the ocean surface and kept going into the ocean without making a sound. i asked everyone what they saw. everyone saw the same object.
content.summary: Very large and silent with four lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home and about two blocks from my home, i looked up into the sky and saw a bright fast travelling light that broke up into 4 bright fast travelling lights , then they disappeared. all happened within approximately 4 seconds. i was in shock but never took my eyes off of it. i told my friend to look but by the time she turned around, the lights had disappeared completely.
content.summary: I looked up into the sky and saw a bright fast travelling light and it broke up into 4 bright fast travelling lights , then they disappeared
